Package com.teamone.unitask.hyperlinks

Class HyperlinkService

java.lang.Object
com.teamone.unitask.hyperlinks.HyperlinkService
@Service public class HyperlinkService extends Object
Service class for the Hyperlink Page.

  • Constructor Details

    • HyperlinkService

      public HyperlinkService()

  • Method Details

    • createHyperlink

      public Hyperlink createHyperlink(Hyperlink requestHyperlink, String projectTitle)
      Takes a Hyperlink object and the project title as input, stores the new Hyperlink Object into the database. If the project title is invalid, returns null.
      Parameters:
      requestHyperlink - The Hyperlink object to be created.
      projectTitle - The title of the project to associate the Hyperlink with.
      Returns:
      The created Hyperlink object if successful, otherwise null.

    • getHyperlinksByProjectTitle

      public List<Hyperlink> getHyperlinksByProjectTitle(String projectTitle)
      Takes the project title as input and returns a list of Hyperlink objects that have the given project as the foreign key for the projectId field. Returns null if the project title is invalid.
      Parameters:
      projectTitle - The title of the project to retrieve Hyperlinks for.
      Returns:
      List of Hyperlinks associated with the given project, or null if the project title is invalid.

    • editHyperlinkByHyperlinkId

      public Hyperlink editHyperlinkByHyperlinkId(Long hyperlinkId, Hyperlink newHyperlink)
      Takes the hyperlinkId and a new hyperlink object as input. Modifies the existing hyperlink in the database. If successfully modified, return the modified hyperlink object. Otherwise, throw the ResourceNotFoundException.
      Parameters:
      hyperlinkId - The id of the hyperlink to be updated.
      newHyperlink - The new Hyperlink object with updated values.
      Returns:
      The updated Hyperlink object.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - If the Hyperlink with the given id is not found.

    • deleteHyperlinkByHyperlinkId

      public Hyperlink deleteHyperlinkByHyperlinkId(Long hyperlinkId)
      Deletes a Hyperlink by its hyperlinkId.
      Parameters:
      hyperlinkId - The id of the hyperlink to be deleted.
      Returns:
      The deleted Hyperlink object.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - If the Hyperlink with the given id is not found.
